display.value: Prognosis - a prediction of the probable outcome of a disease based on a individual's condition and the usual course of the disease as seen in similar situations

Diagnosis - The determination of the nature and/or extent of a disease or condition, or the distinguishing of one disease or condition from another. The assessment may be made through physical examination, laboratory tests, or the likes. Computerized programs may be used to enhance the decision-making process.
Assessment of recovery process, from surgery, therapy, or similar treatment.
Assessment of adverse effects of a treatment.
Assessment of the effectiveness of a treatment.
Assessment of risk for a disease.
